attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whatever he has done - Ronnie Biggs is a dying man. He is been held, at great expense, in a Prison Hospital wing. Why should he be held, for a crime committed in 1963, whilst Paedophiles and Violent Criminals are being released because of lack of Prison space.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
